mapper.select: SELECT P_UUID, P_NAME, SUBTITLE, SUB_CATEGORY, DESCRIPTION, PRICE, IMG_URL, IS_AVAILABLE, C_DATE, SQUANTITY, CATEGORY_ID FROM MENU WHERE CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId} ORDER BY C_DATE DESC

SELECT P_UUID, P_NAME, SUBTITLE, SUB_CATEGORY, DESCRIPTION, PRICE, IMG_URL, IS_AVAILABLE, C_DATE, SQUANTITY, CATEGORY_ID FROM MENU WHERE CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId} AND LOWER(TRIM(SUB_CATEGORY)) = LOWER(TRIM(#{subCategory})) ORDER BY C_DATE DESC
SELECT * FROM MENU WHERE IN_MENU = 'Y' AND CATEGORY_ID IN (1,2,3) ORDER BY C_DATE DESC FETCH FIRST 8 ROWS ONLY
SELECT * FROM MENU WHERE IN_MENU = 'Y' AND CATEGORY_ID IN (4,5) ORDER BY C_DATE DESC FETCH FIRST 5 ROWS ONLY
